cultural_contexts.title: Liila tsa bana (Children's Taboos)
cultural_contexts.description: Traditional restrictions and teachings for Basotho children.
cultural_contexts.content: Bana ba thibeloa ho ja likahare, mahe, matšela-nokana; ho tsamaea sakeng, patlello; ho bitsa batho ba baholo ka mabitso.

cultural_contexts.title: Mekhoa ea lenyalo (Marriage Customs)
cultural_contexts.description: Traditional Basotho marriage practices and relationships.
cultural_contexts.content: Mokhoenjana o hlokomeloa hantle; ngoetsi e ngalla motšeo; ho se bitsa matsale ka lebitso; ho hlokomela boitšoaro le ba boholo.

cultural_contexts.title: Litaba tsa lefa (Inheritance Matters)
cultural_contexts.description: Traditional and modern approaches to inheritance in Basotho culture.
cultural_contexts.content: Lefa le fetisoa ho mora; likhang tsa mafa li rarolloa ka mekhoa ea setso; ho baballa lefa ho bohlokoa.

cultural_contexts.title: Lipapali tsa setso (Traditional Games)
cultural_contexts.description: Games that teach skills and social values.
cultural_contexts.content: Morabaraba (board game), mohobelo (traditional dance), mantloane (family role-playing), khotsoana (counting game).

cultural_contexts.title: Mekhoa ea boipheliso (Livelihood Methods)
cultural_contexts.description: Traditional ways of making a living in Basotho society.
cultural_contexts.content: Temo (farming), mafisa (cattle lending), matsema (community work), phapanyetsano (barter trade).

cultural_contexts.title: Litšomo (Folktales)
cultural_contexts.description: Traditional stories that teach moral lessons.
cultural_contexts.content: Litšomo li ruta botho, bohlale le mekhoa ea bophelo. Mohlala: Tšomo ea Mosimoli le Mosimotsana e ruta ho bolokela kamoso.
